tool_description: Calculates and applies buffer time between appointments to account for travel time, preparation, and transitions between meetings.

appointments.description: List of appointment time ranges to analyze

default_buffer_minutes.description: Default buffer time in minutes between appointments

travel_time_minutes.description: Additional travel time between different locations

appointment_types.description: Types of appointments for custom buffer rules

error_messages: Invalid appointment format: Appointments must be valid datetime range strings.
Buffer time invalid: Buffer minutes must be between 0 and 120.
Travel time invalid: Travel time must be between 0 and 240 minutes.
Too many appointments: Cannot process more than 20 appointments at once.
Appointment overlap detected: Some appointments overlap even before buffer calculation.
usage: Provide appointments array with optional buffer and travel time settings to calculate optimal spacing between meetings.

adjusted_appointments.description: Appointments with buffer time adjustments applied

buffer_conflicts.description: Appointments that cannot accommodate requested buffer time

total_buffer_time.description: Total buffer time added across all appointments

scheduling_efficiency.description: Percentage of time used for actual meetings vs buffer
